text: The JuMP GSOC is handled by NumFocus which deals with other programming lagnuages too, in case a JuMP GSOC student doesn't get choosen for funds for GSOC will JSOC pick the student up if the application is good?
Depends on a lot of variables, tbd

text: We wont know for a while, we need to see the number of proposals  we get, how many slots we are allocated. etc.

text: Mhh it might nudge my decision to submit or not submit an application. It looks like i would need to do without this information *shrug*

Yeah, I wish there was a better answer but it’s impossible to know who will apply, what projects mentors will select, and the number of slots from google that we will get. Keeping my fingers crossed for you though!
